name: HipChat Night Mode Plus
description:
A fork of https://userstyles.org/styles/100951/hipchat-night-mode with a few miscellaneous fixes and updated syntax highlighting colors based on the Solarized palette. (http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized)

On github: https://github.com/noahm/hipchat-night-mode
additional_info:
Version History
===============

- 2015.02.04 : Dial back the intense shade of red used for system messages (@hipchat), don't invert my solarized syntax highlighting
- 2014.12.16 : Added non-prefixed versions of several styles to better support firefox
- 2014.10.07 : Initial release
